description:
Classic cargo shorts, designed to keep you warm on the water. The neoprene lining ups the heat, which comes in handy when you're tackling open water on a SUP or kayak.

  • Made of high-stretch, abrasion resistant nylon fabric
  • Stretchy 0.5mm neoprene lining
  • High-rise neoprene waist for extra coverage
  • Secure side cargo pockets hold essentials
  • Zipper fly with button closure and integrated webbing belt for adjustability
name: Level Six Pro Goddess Lined Shorts - Women's
